text:
Gudi Padwa is the harbinger of a new season, hope and triumph over evil.
The scourge around us can be overcome by vaccination and keeping your mask on.
Happy #GudiPadwa folks. Stay safe. 
Take the vaccine. Keep mask on.
 #COVID19 #vaccine #sketch #doodle #Mumbai #MaskUpIndia https://t.co/YaCuOvd73W
